lines.text:
[Richard and Victoria are making love in the dark]
Richard? I'm over here.
MEOW!
Why are you late?
Because the bell rang before I got here.
[Alcohol is poured into Richard Clark's coffee cup by a burned-out looking alcoholic teacher]
Isn't it a little early to start drinking?
Who stops?
Victoria, could you give me a ride home? I seem to have misplaced my car.
Oh, don't worry about it. All the teachers loose their car on their first day.
[During drug bust]
What is she doing here?
She's my bitch!
[Veronica scolds at him]
Well... my significant other. We've been slappin' skins for sometime, hmmmm?

[referring to Paco's entry into a school dance, even though it's not his school]
Paco's gang always gets into other school dances, and they bring weapons to them
What kind of people bring weapons to a dance?
[Anferney and all his friends nearby put their hands in their coats, and you hear guns cocking]
I inherited the business from my late husband.
I'm shocked!
What? That a woman can run a business?
No. That you were ever married.

[to Ms Doyle]
I'm higher than hell and you're STILL ugly!

[Griff has graduated]
Way to go Griff that's my boy!

[She taps Mrs. McReynolds on the shoulder and then points at Richard]
That's *my* boy
What the hell is going on here?
I was attacked.
Well, what did you expect, dressed like that, and alone, with him?
I've never been very good with relationships. In fact, most of mine ended with "Hey, what are you doing in bed with that other woman?" And that was me talking!
I'm Richard Clark, I'm the new history teacher here. What department do you teach in?
I don't know, something up on the third floor.
[Julie is pregnant with her third child]
Well, Julie I hoped you learned a valuable lesson from this.
Oh, yes. Basically as far as vasectomies go, never use the home kit.
Richard, if you do this, you will fail. You... will... fail! And mark my works, you'll come crawling back here with your tail between your legs!
You're wrong, father. I'm gonna succeed at Barry High School. And, I have no intention of ever crawling back here with anything between my legs!

[voice-over]
Farouk Abdul, please report to the principal's office. One of your fathers is here.
Remember, some things are irreplaceable
Irreplaceable? Nothings gonna happen to me.
[Richard drives away]
I was talking about my car!
[the school nurse hands a student a paper which has an appointment for a pregnancy test]
Here you go you little slut.
You coming on to me, pickledick?
This was a new suit, pickledick.
Why would I have his briefcase unless I was workin' for him?
That's doesn't prove anything. You could have seen him down in the restaurant, dressed up like a waiter, created some kind of diversion while she snatched it from under the table.

[Swallows toothpick]
That's a little farfetched, don't you think?

[trying to act high]
Oh, this shit be kickin'!
As long as you're here, you show some respect to me! Me... Paco Rodriguez Fernandez Martinez Diaz DeJesus Morales Santos... Junior.
Are we not forgetting a name?
What's that?
Skidmark.
Come on, I know you want this. I read Mike Tyson's book.
